effect.sun_moon: Heals the target for ½ its max HP. If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Heals the target for ½ its max HP. If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Heals the target for ½ its max HP. If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.

short_effect.sun_moon: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.
